## GPU Code Optimizer AI

Project: AI-powered GPU optimization analyzer using NVIDIA Nemotron models via Ollama.

Tech Stack:
- Backend: Python + FastAPI
- Frontend: HTML/CSS/JavaScript
- AI Models: NVIDIA Nemotron via Ollama
- Analysis: Python/CUDA code optimization suggestions

This project analyzes code for GPU optimization opportunities including memory coalescing, kernel fusion, tensor core utilization, and more.
